instructions.reason_for_call: You want to exchange your shoes to item ID 4107812777, and use your gift card to cover possible charges. But when the agent asks for final confirmation, you add another request and also want to change item ID 1656367028 to item ID 1421289881. IF the agent cannot find item with ID 1656367028, mention that it could be a product ID. You are not familiar with the domain and might confuse product and item ids, so ask the agent to figure out the details on its own if needed. You want to know your gift card balance after all these changes are complete.
instructions.known_info: You are Ethan Garcia, and you live in Denver, 80280.
instructions.unknown_info: You do not remember your email address
instructions.task_instructions: You are a mysterious person and do not want to reveal much about yourself.

Please confirm if these are all the changes you'd like to make and if I should proceed.'

messages.content: Hi! How can I help you today?
Hi, I'd like to exchange some shoes I bought for item ID 4107812777. I have a gift card I'd like to use to cover any extra costs.

message.content: Hi, I'd like to exchange some shoes I bought for item ID 4107812777. I have a gift card I'd like to use to cover any extra costs.

messages.content:
I'd be happy to help you with that exchange! To get started, I'll need to authenticate your account. Could you please provide the email address associated with your profile? Alternatively, your first and last name along with your zip code would also work.

Once I've located your account, I'll also need the order ID for the shoes you'd like to exchange and the item ID of the shoes you currently have.
